title: Panzer Bait: With the Third Royal Tank Regiment 1939-1945
description: The story of three regular soldiers of The Royal Tank Regiment, who between them were "shot out" of some 40 tanks. Sergeant Bill Close survived Calais 1940, Greece 1941, Sidi-Rezegh, Gazal and Alamein. In the same squadron, in many battles were Sergeants Buck Kite and Geordie Reay.
author: William Moore
